items.sentence: We'll always remember what Tom has done for us.
Tom and Mary walked off in opposite directions.
My younger sister's husband is older than I am.
Whose bicycle did you say you wanted to borrow?
Even if I knew the answer, I wouldn't tell you.
I saw a very interesting documentary yesterday.
I have an appointment to visit a guru in India.
I left home without having breakfast yesterday.
People need to be aware that that might happen.
You'll find what you need in that file cabinet.
Tom danced with Mary first and then with Alice.
I've been trying to explain my feelings to you.
I wish that I had a car that I could depend on.
Everyone could easily see Tom's disappointment.
It's disappointing when you play well and lose.
Do you know the real reason why Tom isn't here?
No one believed that such a thing could happen.
You could hear the desperation in Mary's voice.
You've still got all your life in front of you.
Did you know that Tom and Mary are a thing now?
